name: Food Therapy
description:
A small interactive feeding game were you play as a feeding therapist. Your job is to get your patients into the mood, and them stuff them to the brim with food! Then see them in the next session much wider than the last. This is an early prototype so there are countless bugs, and only three sessions are implemented.

You can play it on your phone too

Cheat: Press ctrl to increase her weight and calories without using food.
